title: For the purpose of calculating the FSI, the entire area of the layout including Development Plan roads and internal roads but excluding the land under the reservation of public amenities shall be considered
clause_text: For the purpose of calculating the FSI, the entire area of the layout including Development Plan roads and internal roads but excluding the land under the reservation of public amenities shall be considered. Sub-division of plots shall be permissible on the basis of the compulsory open spaces as in these Regulations. The reservations in the MHADA layout may be developed as per the provisions of Regulation No. 17(3).
section: 33(5)Development/Redevelopment of Housing Schemes of Maharashtra Housing & Area Development Authority (MHADA)
